mapping.establishing: Wide establishing shot, environment clearly visible.
mapping.dialogue_medium: Medium shot, two characters in frame, clear speech bubbles space.
mapping.emotion_closeup: Close-up portrait, strong facial expression, emotional emphasis.
mapping.action: Dynamic action pose, motion emphasis, dramatic lighting.
mapping.reaction: Reaction shot, character responding, readable expression.
mapping.object_focus: Close focus on an important object, detailed, centered composition.
mapping.reveal: Dramatic reveal composition, subject entering frame or being unveiled, high contrast lighting.
mapping.impact_silence: Stark dramatic pause, minimal elements, powerful negative space, frozen moment.
